thread.title: Mendix on Tour Hits the Road This Fall to Showcase Digital Innovation Success Stories
thread.title_full: Mendix on Tour Hits the Road This Fall to Showcase Digital Innovation Success Stories

author: admin
title: Mendix on Tour Hits the Road This Fall to Showcase Digital Innovation Success Stories
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/8/2015 @ 3:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: Mendix 
BOSTON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Mendix, a leader in driving digital innovation and provider of application Platform-as-a-Service (aPaaS), today announced the launch of its fall 2015 series of Mendix on Tour events. With the theme of “Make Digital a Reality. Now!” Mendix on Tour is designed to provide IT, innovation and digital leaders with strategies and best practices for accelerating their organization’s digital journey. 
Kicking off this week, the six-city fall tour includes stops in Amsterdam, The Hague, Utrecht, London, Boston and Montreal. In addition to keynotes from Mendix executives, the series features a compelling lineup of Mendix customers who will share how they are successfully driving digital innovation by bringing together a smart application strategy, modern development platform and agile approach. 
Customers speakers include ACE Insurance, Collin Crowdfund, Delta Lloyd, Enexis, Expereo, ING Hypotheken, KPN, Julius Centrum, NxStage Medical and more. 
“Digital has leveled the playing field. Whether you’re an incumbent or a startup, the race is on to win, serve and retain customers through digital technologies, and bring innovative new digital products and services to market,” said Johan den Haan, Mendix’s CTO. “Mendix on Tour will help attendees understand the demands of today’s digital enterprise and how to quickly deliver the innovative applications required to compete and win in their markets.” 
Mendix on Tour will land in the following cities this fall: Amsterdam, NL (Sept. 8) – Featuring ING Hypotheken, Collin Crowdfund and Delta Lloyd The Hague, NL (Sept. 10) – Featuring Julius Centrum and Enexis Utrecht, NL (Sept. 15) – Featuring KPN, Kuehne & Nagel Logistics B.V. and Expereo London, UK (Sept. 17) – Featuring ACE Insurance Boston, MA (Sept. 23) – Featuring NxStage Medical Montreal, Canada (Oct. 15) – Program to be announced 
Additional dates and details will be added shortly. 
About Mendix 
Mendix helps enterprises achieve their digital goals. Our digital innovation platform empowers customers to bring new products to market, digitize customer engagement, and automate unique business processes. Facilitating an iterative, collaborative approach, the platform brings business and IT together to build and deploy innovative applications at the speed of ideas. 
A recognized market leader, Mendix is helping hundreds of customers across dozens of industries achieve exceptional results. For more information, visit www.mendix.com and follow us on Twitter @Mendix .
